Text:
function ERU_EP04_12()
    -- .転-2【11月第4週】「『鳳凰』グループ」
    SaveData.Title = "『鳳凰』グループ"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Sadness
 "M-Mina-chin, it's terrible! Arurun... Arurun is nowhere to be found!" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    MSG([[ The next morning, Akira's voice, as if about to cry, woke me from my sinking consciousness. ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ When Akira woke up, it seems Almellia-san was nowhere to be seen. ]])

    MSG([[ She was taken away with such caution that even Akira, who was sleeping in the same bed, didn’t notice. ]])

    MSG([[ When I explained what happened last night, she became unusually upset and started crying out loud. ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Sadness
 "No way... After finally meeting a girl in real life who I really connect with... this is too much." ]])

    MSG([[ I stared at Akira’s tearful face and clenched my fists. If I were stronger, Akira wouldn’t have to cry. ]])

    MSG([[ I truly hate my own weakness. But I can’t mope around like always. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "Don’t worry, Akira. No matter what, I will definitely rescue Almellia-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Surprise
 "M-Mina-chin...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira looked at my face, dazed. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Surprise
 "W-What’s going on? You’d usually be down, caught up in self-loathing, right? Why do you have such a determined look?" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira might be right. If it were me before, I’d probably have visited Marika-neesan’s hospital room and complained at least once. ]])

    MSG([[ But strangely, I don’t feel like that now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "There’s no time to hesitate. If I were stronger, I wouldn’t have lost to Daria-san. I could have saved Almellia-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "If there’s time to hesitate, then I’ll become stronger. I will save Almellia-san even if I have to risk my own life." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Normal
 "...That’s quite the resolve. But do you have any leads on where to find Arurun?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Sadness
 "That, I don’t know." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Akira’s shoulders slumped heavily. ]])

    MSG([[ Sorry. I feel more positive than usual, but that doesn’t mean the situation will immediately improve. ]])

    MSG([[ What to do from here is something I have to think about now. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Wry Smile・Sweat
 "Geez... No glamor here. But I get your resolve, Mina-chin. I’ll take the appropriate risks too." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Normal
 "Your pain from Daria probably hasn’t gone away yet, so please take a bit of rest. I’ll do everything I can." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Saying that, Akira took a dusty notebook PC from the dresser and started typing with an intense expression. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    MSG([[ A few hours later―― ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,20,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,100,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(100)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Serious
 "Destroy the Himegami family!" ]])

    MSG([[ With a phrase that sounded like a political slogan, the strategy meeting for rescuing Almellia-san began. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s eyes were more serious than ever. It was reassuring; she seemed to genuinely worry about Almellia-san as much as I did. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought I couldn’t afford to lose either. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Serious
 "I can’t forgive the Himegami family that took my closest friend Arurun. Let’s rescue her immediately." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "Right. First, we need to find out something about the Himegami family..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Normal
 "Ah, don’t worry. I’ve already finished gathering the necessary info." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Flustered
 "W-What!? How did you do that!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Akira said something unbelievable like it was no big deal. ]])

    MSG([[ It didn’t seem like a joke; she started explaining how she gathered the information. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Smiling
 "I peeked into the <r=アンダーグラウンド>dark</r> web. In short, it’s the deep web that normal people can’t access, where shady info is actively traded." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Grinning
 "I bought some cheap 'rumors' about the Himegami family from someone who hates them. You’d be better off not making enemies, you know?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Sadness
 "Y-You bought it... Is that okay? Couldn’t you get dragged into a crime?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Wry Smile・Sweat
 "It’s a method to be used sparingly. I disguised my connection multiple times, and used untraceable PCs and accounts, so it should be safe." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Sadness
 "But digging through weird videos reminded me of my dark past, and the stress is through the roof... I never want to do that again." ]])

    MSG([[ That sounded like the worst troubles she’s had so far. I decided not to ask any more deeply. ]])

    MSG([[ Then Akira shared the info she bought on the dark web about the Himegami family. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Normal
 "Their main residence is apparently very close to O-something, a place we also often go. It has some strange features and is well-known in the industry." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Serious
 "If Arurun was taken, it’s probably to that main residence. But there’s good info and bad info about sneaking in." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Surprised
 "I-I’d like you to tell me the bad news first, if you don’t mind." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Sadness
 "When Nemesia isn’t at the mansion, a large number of guards are stationed with no gaps even for a bug to enter. The informant said they had a horrible time trying to force their way in." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Serious
 "Also, even if the gate looks open, you absolutely shouldn’t enter without disabling the electronic lock first... unless you want to become a diced steak." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Flustered
 "S-Scary, scary! What on earth would happen to us!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "Still, guards and electronic locks... It won’t be so easy to sneak in, huh." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Normal
 "Actually, not quite. Whenever there’s a regular meeting with the 'Phoenix' group, which the Himegami family belongs to, Nemesia always returns to the mansion, and security gets thin." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Smiling
 "Here’s the good news: if we can find out the date of that meeting, there’s a chance to sneak in." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_plus0027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Sadness
 "Well, of course, I couldn’t find out the date of the meeting though." ]])

    MSG([[ My heart raced with the unexpected information. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s strange that security only lightens while they’re at the mansion, but if that’s true, that’s the only chance. ]])

    MSG([[ We absolutely have to figure out the meeting day and plan an infiltration! ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Smile
 "Thanks, as expected of Akira! This info is more than enough!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Phoenix Group. I remembered Ouga-kun told me about it once during a chat. ]])

    MSG([[ Currently, the domestic economy is centered around six corporate groups, and Ouga-kun’s Rokujou family belongs to the group called '<r=じゅうじょう>Jujou</r>'. ]])

    MSG([[ Among those six corporate groups, the largest one now is 'Phoenix'. ]])

    MSG([[ Led by the Hououin family and Byoudouin family, this group started from a newspaper company and holds immense influence over domestic entertainment from TV, movies to books. ]])

    MSG([[ If the Himegami family is under their protection, there’s no way we ordinary citizens without any backing like us could resist. ]])

    MSG([[ If there’s a way to resist, it would be to seek cooperation from classmates who also belong to one of the six major corporate groups like the Ryuguuin or Rokujou families. ]])

    MSG([[ Realizing this, I couldn’t help but deny my own thoughts. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Flustered
 (N-No, what am I thinking? This is my problem, and dragging everyone else into it—) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    -- //BG：1-A教室
    -- //BU：ダリア（夏服・笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG014aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Summer Uniform・Smile
 "You should rely more on those around you, Erika-kun." ]])
    -- //dahlia_0156.wav

    MSG([[ At that moment, an event from several months ago flashed through my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ It was something Daria-san said to me when I was stuck during the Hakuyou Festival. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Summer Uniform・Smile
 "Trying to get through such a big crisis alone was never realistic. You're not alone. If you carry everything alone, you will break." ]])
    -- //dahlia_0157.wav

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ボイスなし・表情のみ

    MSG([[ I snapped awake to realize I was about to make the same mistake again. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s ironic to be encouraged by the words of the person who took Almellia-san from me, but Daria-san’s words made perfect sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Now is not the time to cling to my own strength. No matter what, no matter whose help it is, I must think only about rescuing Almellia-san, no matter what. ]])

    MSG([[ Besides, I believe the kindness Daria showed that time was genuine. ]])

    MSG([[ Because Daria-san is also one of the companions who has supported me, <r=エリカ>Hime</r> and us. ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1348.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "To stand up to the Himegami family... I really have no choice but to ask everyone at Yuriai Private Academy for help." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("akira_1115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Serious
 "Yes, of course, I’ll cooperate too. It’s time to pool all our strength to save Arurun!" ]])

    MSG([[ Akira nodded strongly at my words. ]])

    MSG([[ Although we just suffered a painful defeat, I didn’t feel bad at all. Rather, I felt courage unlike before. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s okay. I can still catch up. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve always wanted to catch up to the back of Almellia-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_PC0001_1.0.2.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "This time, I won’t lose. I will absolutely save Almellia-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear・Smile
 "That’s the spirit. Don’t lose to someone who pulls new moves like a last-second rock-paper-scissors!" ]])

    MSG([[ And so, our battle to rescue Almellia-san began. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_13")
end
